MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Java.Net.URI ParseServerAuthority() cil managed

Docs.summary: Attempts to parse this URI's authority component, if defined, into user-information, host, and port components.
Docs.returns: A URI whose authority field has been parsed as a server-based authority

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the authority part could not be parsed as a server-based authority.
